entity.name: Representation
entity.description: A Representation is an information data space which is founded in a Representation_context and contains one or more Representation_items as elements.

explicit.name: name
explicit.description:
The name specifies the word or group of words by which the Representation is known.
The name of a Representation which contains all the elements of a CAD model might be the same as that of the CAD model.

explicit.name: items
explicit.description: The items specifies the set of Representation_item instances which make up the Representation.

explicit.name: foundation
explicit.description: The foundation specifies the context for the domain of the Representation.

entity.name: Representation_context
entity.description: A Representation_context defines the foundation for the definitional domain of the Representation.

explicit.name: identifier
explicit.description: the label that distinguishes the Representation_context.

explicit.name: kind
explicit.description: a description of the foundation domain's data space.

inverse.name: representations_in_context
inverse.description:
there shall be at least one Representation referencing the Representation_context.
The kind of a Representation_context might be 2D or 3D if it were geometrical.

entity.name: Representation_item
entity.description: A Representation_item is a single element of a Representation.

explicit.name: name
explicit.description:
the label that distinguishes the Representation_item.
The name of a Representation_item might be its CAD element tag if it were a bit of geometry.
